title: Élie N'Zeyi
text:
Élie N'Zeyi (born 14 June 1997) is a French <a href="Association%20football">football</a> <a href="Midfielder%20%28association%20football%29">midfielder</a>, who last played for <a href="FK%20Pohronie">Pohronie</a> in the <a href="Slovak%20Super%20Liga">Fortuna Liga</a>.
Club career.
FK Pohronie.
N'Zeyi was featured for <a href="FK%20Pohronie">Pohronie</a> in winter friendly games and went on to be signed by the <a href="Slovakia">Slovak</a> <a href="Slovak%20Super%20Liga">Fortuna Liga</a> club.
N'Zeyi was nominated in late February for a league fixture against <a href="AS%20Tren%C4%8D%C3%ADn">AS Trenčín</a> but remained unused. N'Zeyi made his <a href="Slovak%20Super%20Liga">Fortuna Liga</a> debut during an <a href="%C5%A0tadi%C3%B3n%20FK%20Senica">away</a> fixture on 6 March 2021 against <a href="FK%20Senica">Senica</a>. He came on in the 89th minute to replace <a href="Martin%20Adamec">Martin Adamec</a> and seal the defence. Pohronie was in a narrow 1:0 lead, thanks to a first-half goal by <a href="Patrik%20Blah%C3%BAt">Patrik Blahút</a>. Senica's late pressure was, however, converted into a last-minute equaliser set by a header from <a href="Marin%20Ljubi%C4%8Di%C4%87%20%28footballer%2C%20born%201988%29">Marin Ljubičić</a>. The match ended in said tie.
